examples: they are a bunch of inbred idiots

adjective.description: Existing in a person, animal, or plant from birth; congenital.

noun.description: A person born as a result of inbreeding, typically perceived as unattractive and lacking intelligence (often used as a general term of abuse)
examples: he provoked criticism when he said the town was full of inbreds

noun.description: A crop produced by repeated inbreeding over multiple generations, typically through self-pollination.
examples: the magnitude of this effect is expected to be greater in inbreds than in hybrids
